tasks.instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task
tasks.description: The bar chart shows expectation to change of European young people in the next 20 years in 5 different areas.

tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: Some people think that sending criminals to prison is not effective. Education and job training should be used instead. Do you agree or disagree?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
